server.title: Plugin Server Host Address
server.description: Address of the plugin HTTP server.  Most likely the VDI-internal network alias of the container.

dataTypes.title: Data Types
dataTypes.description: Types and versions of dataset data handled by the plugin being defined.

typeChangesEnabled.description: Whether datasets can be revised from this data type to another.

customPath.title: PATH Extension
customPath.description:
Allows adding additional paths to the PATH environment variable passed to plugin scripts on execution in the typical colon (`:`) divided format.
Leading or trailing colon characters are not required.

installRoot.title: Dataset File Install Root
installRoot.description: The root mount path INSIDE THE CONTAINER which will contain the site build directory hierarchy into which dataset files will be installed.  The build directory itself MUST NOT be part of this path.

maxFileSize.title: Maximum File Size
maxFileSize.description:
Maximum permitted file size in bytes.

If this value exceeds the global max upload size configuration option, that value will be used instead.

allowedFileExtensions.title: Permitted File Extensions
allowedFileExtensions.description:
File extensions that are allowed on raw uploaded files, or on the content files of archive uploads.

This list should not include the supported vdi archive extensions.

usesDataProperties.title: Enable Data Properties Files
usesDataProperties.description: Flag indicating whether the data type allows the use of additional data properties/metadata files.

dataPropsFileNameSingular.title: Singular Properties File Form Name
dataPropsFileNameSingular.description: Name to show for singular data properties file references in user facing text.

dataPropsFileNamePlural.title: Plural Properties File Form Name
dataPropsFileNamePlural.description: Name to show for plural data properties files references in user facing text.
